title: 325btc
author: 325btc
content: Yes time is running out and turkey dont agree to let the fin and swed in to nato.Time is running out russia with allies can take over sweden and finland easy and no nato countries are not allowed to protect or interept while russia attacting them.If the or western countries interept and fin and sweden not in the NATO officially then we could even see the benalty or sanctions russia has every right to impose over countries of nato.But off course benalty payment can be payed only with russian rubles or chinese currency or usd perhaps usdc or usdt.World is run like aagrements and rules those whos not follow to aagrements percise will get punished.We dont look things in the point of humanity or whats comes from our good hearts untfornately aagrements and rules are what we follow sure many western countries want to do good things but they might fail on this.Imagine how low the euro will go and inflation will hit hard the eurozone and if all those euros will be massive way to start changing to other currencies to get rubles for example.
